@@ -1624,3 +1624,3 @@ - *

On platforms which do not support setting a file's read permission, - * this method does nothing and returns the value of the {@code readable} - * parameter. + *

If the underlying file system does not implement a read permission, + * then this method does nothing and returns the value of the + * {@code readable} parameter. @@ -1678,3 +1678,3 @@ - *

On platforms which do not support setting a file's read permission, - * this method does nothing and returns the value of the {@code readable} - * parameter. + *

If the underlying file system does not implement a read permission, + * then this method does nothing and returns the value of the + * {@code readable} parameter. @@ -1714,3 +1714,3 @@ - *

On platforms which do not support setting a file's execute permission, - * this method does nothing and returns the value of the {@code executable} - * parameter. + *

If the underlying file system does not implement an execute + * permission, then this method does nothing and returns the value of the + * {@code executable} parameter. @@ -1768,3 +1768,3 @@ - *

On platforms which do not support setting a file's execute permission, - * this method does nothing and returns the value of the {@code executable} - * parameter. + *

If the underlying file system does not implement an execute + * permission, then this method does nothing and returns the value of the + * {@code executable} parameter.
